full_summary:
---------------

### F1571-220195 Port Hardy Harbour Electrical Upgrade

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Notice Details
---------------

* **Notice Number**: WS4434446290-Doc4434488066
* **Notice Date**: February 7, 2024
* **Expiry Date**: February 22, 2024 (14:00:00 hours)
* **Contract Start Date**: March 7, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: December 20, 2024

### Description
-------------

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) and Small Craft Harbours (SCH) are seeking bids to upgrade the existing electrical system at two of their harbour facilities in Port Hardy, British Columbia.

The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

* Demolition and recycling of existing electrical equipment, wiring, and connections
* Provision and installation of new marine-grade electrical equipment, enclosures, wiring, and connections
* Installation of new Trinity House Lock (TRC) and Rectangular Concrete (RC) boxes
* Electrical testing and reporting for a fully functional system

### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
-----------------------------------

* Bidders must be qualified to perform electrical work in British Columbia
* The successful bidder will be selected based on their lowest compliant bid

### Instructions to Bidders
-------------------------

To obtain the full Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP), please visit the Ariba Discovery website at:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18739011?extsite=MTg3MzkwMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Contact Information
--------------------

For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

Allison, Rodnie (SPAC/PSPC)
rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This notice is an invitation to qualify, and interested suppliers are encouraged to submit their qualifications to the procurement team. Please note that no tender documents are available at this time, and the procurement process is still ongoing. The successful bidder will be selected based on their qualifications and compliance with the requirements outlined in the NPP. [continue servicedisclaimers]
